Gold.en: Their shapes look like hieroglyphs on ancient tablets. It is said that the two are somehow related.

Silver.en: Its flat, thin body is always stuck on walls. Its shape appears to have some meaning.

Crystal.en: Because different types of Unown exist, it is said that they must have a variety of abilities.

Ruby.en: This Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.

Sapphire.en: This Pokémon is shaped like ancient writing. It is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown. Research into this topic is ongoing but nothing is known.

Emerald.en: This Pokémon is shaped like ancient text characters. Although research is ongoing, it is a mystery as to which came first, the ancient writings or the various Unown.

Pearl.en: They seem to communicate among each other telepathically. They are always found stuck on walls.

Platinum.en: When alone, nothing happens. However, if there are two or more, an odd power is said to emerge.
